item.title: ARE YOU MICONCEIVING MINORITY PEOPLE'S IDENTITIES; A GATEWAY INTO WHITEWASHING?
item.description: If you live in Canada, you know it is an ethnically diverse country, but have you ever thought about how you assume a personâ€™s ethnic origin? Canada is home to over 400,000 immigrants, a number that continues to rise, and Middle Eastern refugees currently account for 11% of these immigrants [1,2]. The ability to perceive minority groups affects the authenticity of our interactions and relationships with individuals from these groups [3].
